description:
You are given an array of n numbers containing n+1 integers where the array forms the permutation of n numbers. But one number is coming twice due to which permutation gets wrong. You have to find the number coming twice.

Permutation of n means the array consists of all the elements in the range [1, n] once.

#### Example
##### Input

```
8
1 2 2 3 4 5 6 7
```

#### Output
`2`

##### Input Format:

```
first line contains n the size of the array
second line contains n elements of the array.
```

##### Output Format:
`Print the single appeared number`

#### Constraints :

```
1<=n<=1000  
1<=arr[i]<=10000  
0<=i<=n-1
```
title: Find the duplicate number
